solarCalc.title: Solar Application Form
solarCalc.subtitle: Answer a few questions to get a recommended system.
solarCalc.generatorCostHelpNoGrid: No grid: adjust this rate to derive kWh from your bill.
solarCalc.generatorShareHelp: Share of total kWh currently supplied by generator.
solarCalc.monthlyKwhHelper: If unknown, estimate from your bill.
solarCalc.monthlyBillHelper: If unknown, use your typical monthly bill.
solarCalc.areaHelper: Enter available roof/ground area in m².
solarCalc.pshHelper: Average PSH: ~6 hours (summer), ~4 hours (winter) in KSA. Allowed range: 2–7.

typeMsg.commercial: Consider commercial-grade inverters and modules for enhanced reliability.
typeMsg.agri: Ideal for agricultural water pumping applications.

solarCalc.areaInsufficient: Provided area ({{area}} m²) may be insufficient — consider higher-efficiency modules or ground mounts.
solarCalc.hugeBillTip1: Higher ROI potential — expect faster payback with your current bill level.
solarCalc.hugeBillTip2: Consider upsizing the system by ~20-30% to maximize reduction and hedge future rates.
solarCalc.hugeBillTip3: We recommend an energy audit to capture quick efficiency wins before final sizing.
solarCalc.hugeBillTip4: We can also review your tariff tier to ensure you’re on the optimal plan.
solarCalc.systemCostLarge: For systems above 500 kW, please contact a professional engineer for a business-grade custom design.
solarCalc.assumptions: Assumptions: PSH {{psh}} h/day, derate 80%, VAT included in electricity bill. Hybrid/Off-grid pricing includes batteries and larger inverter allowances.
solarCalc.industrialStandardNote: Standard industrial tariff is defined as grid-connected.
solarCalc.outageQuestion: Do you suffer from frequent power outages?
solarCalc.highBillQuestion: Do you suffer from a bill price that is too high?
solarCalc.shareLinkHelp: Copy or share a link with your current inputs
solarCalc.approxNotice: Approximation notice: This calculator provides an estimate and is not 100% accurate. Final system design and pricing require an engineer assessment and detailed load study. Contact us to get a tailored calculation and quote that fits your business.
solarCalc.whatsappCta: Contact via WhatsApp for Free Consultant Quote
solarCalc.savedCalcsHelp: Click a row to reuse inputs; changes auto-recalculate.
solarCalc.noCalcs: No calculations yet. Submit the form to add entries.
solarCalc.validationLow: Monthly bill looks too low for the entered consumption. Please verify both values.
solarCalc.validationHigh: Monthly bill looks too high for the entered consumption. Please verify both values.
solarCalc.whatsappCalcMissing: Calculation did not run — please review inputs.

homeAbout.title: About AQTRA
homeAbout.paragraph1: AQTRA is a leading engineering and contracting company dedicated to delivering integrated solutions across multiple disciplines. Our commitment to accuracy and quality is reflected in every project we undertake.
homeAbout.paragraph2: From smart home automation to sustainable solar energy systems, we combine technical expertise with innovative thinking to create solutions that enhance modern living and business operations.
homeAbout.paragraph3: Our comprehensive service portfolio includes HVAC systems, plumbing, electrical installations, and network infrastructure – all designed to meet the evolving needs of our clients.

about.overviewDescription: AQTRA Company is a leading provider of engineering solutions, specializing in HVAC, Electrical, Low-Current Systems, Smart Home & Automation and Solar Energy Solutions. With a commitment to innovation and excellence, we deliver cutting-edge solutions tailored to meet the unique needs of our clients.
about.sector1Description: Comprehensive climate control and mechanical solutions for residential, commercial, and industrial projects.
about.sector2Description: Advanced automation solutions for modern living, enhancing convenience, security, and energy efficiency.
about.sector3Description: Reliable electrical installations and low-current systems for communication, security, and data networks.
about.sector4Description: Sustainable and renewable energy solutions to reduce carbon footprints and achieve energy independence.
about.sector5Description: Innovative embedded systems and IoT solutions for smarter devices and connected environments.
about.licensesDescription: AQTRA Company holds a range of professional licenses and certifications, including Civil Defense approvals, HVAC installation certificates, low-voltage compliance, and safety and quality certifications. These credentials reflect our commitment to excellence and adherence to industry standards.
about.experienceDescription: With over a decade of combined expertise, AQTRA Company has successfully delivered projects across commercial, residential, industrial, and healthcare sectors. Our team is known for its reliability, technical accuracy, engineering quality, and exceptional project management capabilities.
about.missionDescription: To provide innovative and sustainable engineering solutions that exceed client expectations, while fostering a culture of excellence and continuous improvement.
about.visionDescription: To be a global leader in engineering and technology solutions, driving progress and creating value for our clients and communities.
valuesList: Integrity: We uphold the highest standards of honesty and transparency in all our dealings.
Innovation: We embrace creativity and strive to deliver cutting-edge solutions.
Excellence: We are committed to delivering quality and exceeding expectations.
Sustainability: We prioritize environmentally friendly practices and solutions.
Collaboration: We believe in the power of teamwork and strong partnerships.

servicesPage.subtitle: Explore the wide range of services we offer to meet your needs.

solarSolutions.title: Solar Solutions
solarSolutions.subtitle: Reliable solar energy systems for homes, businesses and industrial sites. On-grid, off-grid and hybrid configurations.
solarSolutions.heading: Solar Energy Solutions
solarSolutions.description: Design, supply and installation of photovoltaic (PV) systems tailored to your needs.

onGrid.title: On-Grid
onGrid.desc: Grid-tied PV systems — export surplus energy and reduce bills.

offGrid.title: Off-Grid
offGrid.desc: Standalone systems with batteries for full independence.

hybrid.title: Hybrid
hybrid.desc: Grid-connected systems with battery backup and smart control.

pumping.title: Pumping
pumping.desc: Solar water pumping solutions for irrigation and remote supply.

hvacSolutions.title: HVAC & Chiller
hvacSolutions.subtitle: Optimal climate control and air quality solutions.
hvacSolutions.heading: HVAC Services
hvacSolutions.description: Professional Heating, Ventilation & Air Conditioning Solutions by AQTRA Company

ducting.title: Ducting Fabrication
ducting.summary: Ducting fabrication to ensure efficient airflow.
ducting.body: AQTRA provides high-precision ducting fabrication to ensure efficient airflow and improved indoor air quality. We use premium materials and advanced machinery to deliver durable, leak-proof duct systems following SMACNA and ASHRAE standards.
list: Custom GI, PI, and aluminum duct fabrication
Installation of dampers, access doors & fittings

chillers.title: Chillers
chillers.summary: Expert installation and servicing of air-cooled and water-cooled chillers.
chillers.body: AQTRA offers expert installation and servicing of air-cooled and water-cooled chillers for commercial, industrial, and medical facilities. Our systems are designed for maximum cooling efficiency and reliability.
list: Chiller plant design, sizing & load calculation
Compressor, pump, motor & control system repair

ahu.title: Air Handling Units (AHUs)
ahu.summary: Expert installation and servicing of air handling units.
ahu.body: Our AHU services ensure clean, comfortable air through efficient ventilation, filtration, and cooling. We provide installation, maintenance, and upgrades of AHUs for all types of buildings.
list: Supply of FAHU, HRU, FCU, and VAV units
Fan, motor, belt, coil & damper repair

maintenance.title: Maintenance
maintenance.summary: Comprehensive HVAC maintenance programs for optimal performance and longevity.
maintenance.body: AQTRA delivers complete HVAC maintenance programs to ensure long lifespan, reduced energy consumption, and optimal performance for all HVAC equipment across commercial and industrial facilities.

servicePage.subtitle: Explore our comprehensive solutions.

saudiVision.title: Saudi Vision 2030
saudiVision.subtitle: A bold blueprint for transforming Saudi Arabia into a global leader in economic, social, and cultural development.
saudiVision.overviewText: Saudi Vision 2030 is a strategic framework launched in 2016 by the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia to reduce its dependence on oil, diversify its economy, and develop public service sectors such as health, education, infrastructure, recreation, and tourism. It aims to position Saudi Arabia as a global investment powerhouse and a hub connecting three continents: Asia, Europe, and Africa.
saudiVision.pillarVibrantText: The goal of a vibrant society is to create a rich and fulfilling life for all citizens and residents. This includes promoting cultural and entertainment opportunities, preserving Saudi heritage, and improving the quality of life through world-class healthcare and education.
saudiVision.pillarThrivingText: A thriving economy focuses on diversifying income sources, empowering the private sector, and creating job opportunities for all. It emphasizes innovation, entrepreneurship, and attracting foreign investment to drive sustainable growth.
saudiVision.pillarAmbitiousText: An ambitious nation aims to enhance government effectiveness, transparency, and accountability. It seeks to foster a culture of responsibility and volunteerism, ensuring that all citizens contribute to the nation’s progress.
targetsList: Increase private sector GDP contribution from 40% to 65%.
Raise foreign direct investment from 3.8% to 5.7% of GDP.
Grow non-oil revenue from SAR 163 billion to SAR 1 trillion.
Improve the quality of life index ranking to be among the top 10 globally.
Increase the number of volunteers from 11,000 to 1 million.
Enhance e-government services and digital transformation.
saudiVision.impactText: Vision 2030 presents immense opportunities for businesses, society, and the global community. It fosters a dynamic business environment, attracts foreign investment, and drives infrastructure development. The vision also enhances the quality of life for citizens and residents, creating a sustainable and diversified economy for future generations.
